embed.description: Gives access to 0send command. Will send, a your messages as a embed

boost.description: boost xp in general for the next 24 hours

passive_runner.description: Decreases passive bake time by a half for the next 6 hours

fishing_line.description: increase the amount of bits earned from messages for the next 24 hours

randomizer.description: gives you the ability have your appearance be random. 0randomizer makes your appearnce random. To stop randomness, change your wardrobe, change an attribute or use 0randomizer stop.

hard_worker.description: For the next 5 bakes, increases each of your shop stats by one

business_speech.description: Increases both xp and bits earned for being in voice chat {**coming soon**}

golden_oven.description: gives access to the crafting table

banking_degree.description: Gives ability to invest into an extra stock {*coming soon*}

firesale.description: decrease the price of every nft by 5% for the next purchase {*coming soon*}

brewing_station.description: gives access to the brewing station

advanced_degree.description: Gives ability to invest into an extra stock {*coming soon*}

foresight.description: increases the chances of making profit during an investment
